entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 11:19 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
